textContent:
Happy New Year my baby boy ğŸ¤­ğŸ©· 
As I look back, we've grown a lot as a couple this year, we fought we fixed we stayed. 
Last year this day I was really convinced that I don't matter much to you but as time went by I came to realise that being the first one to wish on new year doesn't really define my importance in your life, if doesn't state whether you're going to be the person who sticks around throughout the year. So this year I won't expect that from your end but yes I'm more into such things (I've made it pretty obvious by now ğŸ˜¶‍ğŸŒ«ï¸) that is why I'm writing it here! 

I wish and pray that God listens to your prayers, you lead an even healthier life this year, I wish and pray you get to achieve all of that you've wished for Umair. 
I pray that God keeps you safe from everything that comes in your way (even if it's me) ğŸ¥º

I pray that we both grow even more in love and patience and understanding. 
I pray that we make past this year too and many more that's to come. 
I LOVE YOU UMAIR ğŸ©·

HAPPY NEW YEAR MY UMZYPIE PLUM PUDDING ğŸ¤­
title: We enter 2026 together!
textContentHtml:
Happy New Year my baby boy ğŸ¤­ğŸ©· 

As I look back, we've grown a lot as a couple this year, we fought we fixed we stayed. 

Last year this day I was really convinced that I don't matter much to you but as time went by I came to realise that being the first one to wish on new year doesn't really define my importance in your life, if doesn't state whether you're going to be the person who sticks around throughout the year. So this year I won't expect that from your end but yes I'm more into such things (I've made it pretty obvious by now ğŸ˜¶‍ğŸŒ«ï¸) that is why I'm writing it here! 


I wish and pray that God listens to your prayers, you lead an even healthier life this year, I wish and pray you get to achieve all of that you've wished for Umair. 

I pray that God keeps you safe from everything that comes in your way (even if it's me) ğŸ¥º


I pray that we both grow even more in love and patience and understanding. 

I pray that we make past this year too and many more that's to come. 

I LOVE YOU UMAIR ğŸ©·


HAPPY NEW YEAR MY UMZYPIE PLUM PUDDING ğŸ¤­
